article_title: Moving From A Welfare And Dependency Society To Prosperity And Opportunity

article_metadata.author: Grace-Marie Turner

og.description: I have a new post over at The American Spectator examining ObamaCare through the lens of President Lincoln and President Reagan’s optimistic vision of America. Under Obamacare, public assistance programs no longer are seen as a safety net but as a way of life — and not just for lower-income people [...]
